title: Incomplete Server Transfer
body: I transfered my account from NA server to LAN but now it won't let me login on either server and after sending an email, a twit, and a ticket. I still haven't gotten a response from support. It is my olders account, I've had it since Season 2 and as of right now it's lost in Server Limbo. Please help!

replies.body: Sending tweets or boards post can't help with account transfer issues, unfortunately. You should hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asap and they'll be able to get this fixed up for ya!
Thanks for your reply. I have already submitted a couple of tickets but nobody responds to them. The most recent ticket I opened was #32109040
